original: *nods and say:  "<greet>", checks his watch, scratch his head.  "What do you need?"
translation: *点头说：“<greet>”，检查他的手表，搔他的头你需要什么？”

original: <name_g> did you actually believed that <name_b>?  I don't hide anything from you!  Kill him please and please don't kill me!
translation: <name_g>你真的相信<name_b>吗？我不会瞒着你的！请杀了他，请不要杀我！

original: <no>, <name_b>. <ill_kill_you>, <name_b>. You've helped me enough, so I can finish my mission without you, <name_b>!
translation: <no>, <name_b>. <ill_kill_you>, <name_b>。你帮了我很多，所以我可以不用你完成我的任务，<name_b>！

original: <very> good, <name_g>.  If you want, I could make another pair of steel fists for you too!  Talk to me if you're interested.
translation: <very>好，<name_g>。如果你愿意，我也可以再给你做一双铁拳！有兴趣的话跟我说。

original: A human body covered by a weather-beaten and badly damaged set of riot gear. This one has a wooden hand.
translation: 被一套饱经风霜和严重损坏的防暴装备覆盖的人体。这只手是木制的。

original: A lot of new people came here recently?
A piece of paper with an advertisement of'Flame Knuckle' fighting school.
translation: 一张写着“火焰指节”搏击学校广告的纸。

original: A remote weapon system derived from the M153 CROWS II and enhanced with autonomous operation software.  Thousands of these were deployed by the US military before the Cataclysm and they were valued for their use in engaging infantry without exposing the operator.  This one is fitted with a M240.
translation: 由M153 CROWS II衍生的远程武器系统，并通过自主操作软件增强。在大灾变之前，美军部署了数千枚这样的武器，它们的价值在于在不暴露操作人员的情况下与步兵交战。这个装有M240。

original: A scrap of paper.  Something written on it, scrawled in terrible handwriting.
translation: 一张纸。上面写着什么，字迹潦草。

original: Actually can I ask you something else?

translation: 事实上，我要踢你的屁股！
实际上，你会在这里结束。

original: Afraid of losing?  I'll go look for a worthy opponent somewhere else.
translation: 怕输？我要去别的地方找一个有价值的对手。

original: Ah, The Chosen One!  What brings you to this sacred place?
translation: 啊，被选中的人！是什么把你带到这个神圣的地方来的？

original: Ah, glad to see another living soul in this cursed world.  What brings you to this sacred place?
translation: 啊，很高兴在这个被诅咒的世界里看到另一个活着的灵魂。是什么把你带到这个神圣的地方来的？

original: Ah, it's you again.  I have another task for you.  Did you know that this church was built 287 years ago, and stood still to this day?  More interesting, that this church was built by one man!  By one priest this church was built, and he was called saint because of his will, pureness and love for God.  Even more interesting, I learn from notes of current (deceased, sadly) priest that his remains were kept in the basement, until it was taken away by some research group to learn about its healing powers.  I want you to get back his remains.
translation: 啊，又是你。我有另一个任务给你。你知道这座教堂建于287年前，至今仍然屹立不动吗？更有趣的是，这座教堂是由一个人建造的！这座教堂是由一位牧师建造的，他之所以被称为圣徒，是因为他的意志、纯洁和对上帝的爱。更有趣的是，我从现任（已故的，可悲的）牧师的笔记中得知，他的遗体一直保存在地下室，直到被一些研究小组带走，以了解其治疗能力。我要你找回他的遗体。

original: Ah, my favorite customer.  What brings you here?
translation: 啊，我最喜欢的顾客。什么风把你吹来了？

original: Ah, my fellow warrior of the light, it's good that you're alive.  I have another task for you.  You need to help my dear brother, Brother Randolph, to lift his curse, so that his soul could reach the heaven and rest peacefully for eternity.
translation: 啊，我的光明战士，你还活着真好。我有另一个任务给你。你需要帮助我亲爱的兄弟，伦道夫兄弟解除他的诅咒，这样他的灵魂才能到达天堂，永远安息。

original: Ah, what a relief!  You did good, my <name_g>.
translation: 啊，真是松了一口气！你做得很好，我的<name_g>。

original: Ahem.  Your debt is repaid.  You can relax.
translation: 啊哼。你的债还清了。你可以放松。

original: Akira suddenly attacked you.  Maybe this is part of the training?
translation: 阿基拉突然袭击了你。也许这是训练的一部分？

original: Always picking weakest victim to mock.  Go ahead, mock old weak lady.  Kids these days, no respect for elders…
translation: 总是挑最弱的受害者来嘲笑。去吧，嘲笑那个软弱的老太太。现在的孩子，不尊重长辈…

original: And now, the last one: Kentaro's sword!  I thought that it was well hidden in some temple, far away in the mountains, but recently I learned that it was stolen!  Some lousy politician funded a famous band of tomb raiders that agreed to break in that temple and steal Kentaro's precious sword.  FOOLS, IT COULD BE CURSED!  THEY COULD DOOM THE WHOLE WORLD BY STEALING IT!  ARGH… AHEM!  Find his sword for me, please.
translation: 现在，最后一把：肯塔罗的剑！我原以为它藏在某个寺庙里，很远的山里，但最近我才知道它被偷了！一些卑鄙的政客资助了一个著名的古墓丽影乐队，他们同意闯进那座寺庙偷走肯塔罗的宝剑。傻瓜们，这会被诅咒的！他们可以通过偷来毁灭整个世界！啊…啊！请帮我找到他的剑。

original: And why should I tell you, instead of just kill you and return to my business?
translation: 我为什么要告诉你，而不是杀了你，回到我的生意上？

original: Apparently this zombie was doing time when the Cataclysm struck.  It wears black and white striped prisoner clothes, and tattoos can be seen on his decaying skin. One of the tatoos on his face looks like a dragon.
translation: 很明显，当大灾变发生时，这个僵尸正在计时。它穿着黑白条纹的囚衣，腐烂的皮肤上可以看到纹身。他脸上的一个塔图看起来像一条龙。

original: Apprentices are just random crooks, but that trainer guy is one of the finest in his school.  Be careful with your approach.
translation: 学徒只是随便的骗子，但那个训练师是学校里最好的。小心你的方法。
你准备好了吗，我的学生？

original: Are you still interested? This one may be harder.
translation: 你还感兴趣吗？这个可能更难。

original: Are you sure you telling me the truth?
translation: 你确定你说的是实话吗？

original: As you can see, there's <the_cataclysm> outside, and <zombies> roaming the streets. Still, I stick with code of assassins, and I need to finish my contracts. You want to help me with easy ones? I'll teach you something cool if you help me.
translation: 正如你所看到的，外面有<the_cataclysm>，街上到处都是<zombies>。不过，我还是坚持《刺客守则》，我需要完成我的合同。你想帮我做些简单的吗？如果你帮我，我会教你一些很酷的东西。

original: Bah, what's the point of it? It's all story now. Let's focus on todays problems.
translation: 呸，这有什么意义？现在都是故事了。让我们关注今天的问题。

original: Bartender asked you to get rid of nasty hobo.
translation: 酒保让你把讨厌的流浪汉赶走。

original: Be <very> careful with your approach.  Prisons are guarder by police bots and turrets, and they are a <very> dangerous.
translation: <very>小心地操作。监狱由警察机器人和炮塔守卫，它们是一个<very>危险的地方。

original: Be careful.  The guy could be found out, so try not to bring tail here.
translation: 小心。那家伙可能会被发现的，所以尽量不要把尾巴带到这里。

original: Be patient, nothing is ready yet.  In this case, the main thing is patience. Otherwise nothing sensible will come of it.
translation: 耐心点，还没有准备好。在这种情况下，最主要的是耐心。否则就不会有什么明智的结果。

original: Before <the_cataclysm>,  I was in a secret police search party that was formed to track an assassin, who worked for a famous kingpin.  They called him 'Bill The Assassin'.  Somehow, we managed to track him, and even put him behind bars for a <very> long time.  But you see, the situation changed drastically outside, and I know the guy like him wouldn't hesitate to use it as a chance to break free.  And, um, I think the guy like him would definitely try to take his revenge, so… I just want to know for sure if the guy is alive or turned into <zombie>.  Find police records, so I can learn where did they locked him, and maybe learn what happened to him there.
translation: 在“大灾变”之前，我参加了一个秘密的警察搜索小组，这个小组是为了追踪一个为一个著名的头目工作的刺客而成立的。他们称他为“刺客比尔”。不知怎的，我们设法追踪到了他，甚至把他关了<very>久的牢。但是你看，外面的情况发生了巨大的变化，我知道像他这样的人会毫不犹豫地利用这个机会挣脱束缚。而且，嗯，我想像他这样的人肯定会报复，所以…我只想确定这家伙是活着还是变成了<zombie>。找到警方的记录，这样我就能知道他们把他锁在哪里了，也许还能知道他在那里发生了什么。

original: Before <the_cataclysm>, I traveled around the country.  During the day I made money by performing various shows on the streets, and at night I went to bars in search of rare liquor.  Often my campaigns ended in fights, and since I really like to drink, I had to fight a little drunk.  Thus, I improved my skills and soon it turned into a full-fledged fighting style.
translation: 在大灾变之前，我周游了全国。白天我在街上表演各种节目赚钱，晚上我去酒吧寻找稀有的酒。我的竞选活动常常以打架告终，因为我真的很喜欢喝酒，所以我不得不喝得有点醉。因此，我提高了我的技能，很快就变成了一个成熟的战斗风格。

original: Berry asked you to bring him a bottle of nice moonshine called 'Uncle Ben's Mustang'.
translation: 贝瑞让你给他带瓶好酒，叫“本叔叔的野马”。

original: Berry asked you to find his brother.  According to him, his brother got caught by some bandits.
translation: 贝瑞让你去找他哥哥。据他说，他哥哥被强盗抓住了。

original: Berry want some vodka for his sore throat. Bring him a bottle.
translation: 贝瑞想喝点伏特加治喉咙痛。给他拿瓶来。

original: Berry, I swear to god, if you don't stop with your jokes…
translation: 贝瑞，我向上帝发誓，如果你不停止你的玩笑…

original: Bill told me everything.  You want to screw me over and got all neat stuff from Billy's secret stash all by yourself? Not this time.  Ha-Ha on You!
translation: 比尔把一切都告诉了我。你想把我搞砸，一个人从比利的秘密藏身处弄来所有干净的东西？这次不行。哈哈哈！

original: Boxer Johnny sounds cool! If you are sure about it, lead me to their leader, so he can accept me.
translation: 拳击手约翰尼听起来很酷！如果你确定的话，带我去见他们的首领，这样他就可以接受我了。
拳击手约翰尼被砍下的头。

original: Bring me more students, so I can have more force to deal with <the_cataclysm>.
translation: 给我带更多的学生来，这样我就可以有更多的力量来应对这场灾难。

original: Can I help you with something?
Can you teach me your fighting style?
translation: 你能教我你的格斗风格吗？

original: Can you tell me again what do you need?
translation: 你能再告诉我一次你需要什么吗？

original: Can't you see I'm training? Get out of my way, <name_b>!
translation: 你没看到我在训练吗？让开，<name_b>！

original: Cost asked you to find crashed heli
Cost asked you to help him get in contact with a special agent that is working in this area to finish his mission
translation: 考斯特让你帮他联系一个在这一地区工作的特工来完成他的任务

original: Cost asked you to lead him to military bunker
translation: 成本让你带他去军事掩体

original: Damn, not that crazy bastard again.  What do you want?
translation: 该死，又不是那个疯子了。你想要什么？

original: Damn, not that crazy bitch again.  What do you want?
translation: 妈的，又不是那个疯婆子了。你想要什么？

original: Damn, you helped your <name_g> and then decapitated him?  You absolutely madman!  Here, take this, and please, get the hell out!
translation: 该死，你帮了你的<name_g>然后砍了他的头？你真是个疯子！来，拿着这个，拜托，滚出去！

original: Do I look like a person who can teach you something?  Leave me alone.
translation: 我看起来像个能教你东西的人吗？别管我。

original: Do you have any brew on you?
Do you running this place all by yourself?
translation: 你一个人经营这个地方吗？

original: Do you want to become an apprentice of Boxer Johnny?
translation: 你想成为拳击手约翰尼的学徒吗？

original: Do you want to become an apprentice of Flame Knuckle?
translation: 你想成为火焰指节的学徒吗？

original: Do you want to become an apprentice of Iron Palm?
Don't make any trouble and you'll be fine.
Everything is ready, <name_g>." He winked conspiratorially.  "Well, shall we try our 'potion'?
translation: “一切都准备好了，<name_g>。”他密谋地眨了眨眼我们要不要试试我们的“药水”？

original: FEMA camps was full of people when shit hit the fan, and I guarantee that it's full of <zombies> now.
translation: 联邦应急管理局的营地里挤满了人，我敢保证这里现在已经挤满了僵尸。

original: FINE, fine… You got me.  I need you to do me a little favor.  I need few <very> rare stones that can only be found deeply underground.  Find me 8 spiral stones and you'll get your training
translation: 好吧，好吧…你抓住我了。我需要你帮我一个小忙。我需要几块只有在地下<very>深处才能找到的稀有石头。给我找8块螺旋石，你就可以接受训练了
为维多利亚找到8个螺旋形的石头。

original: Find Tabi of the great hero Kentaro.
translation: 找到伟大英雄肯塔罗的塔比。

original: Find armor of the great hero Kentaro.
translation: 找到伟大英雄肯塔罗的盔甲。

original: Find helmet of the great hero Kentaro.
translation: 找到伟大英雄肯塔罗的头盔。

original: Find large barrel so I can have a place to burn my wood.
translation: 找个大木桶，这样我就有地方烧木头了。

original: Find me 20 blocks of cheese for my pet rat.
translation: 给我的宠物老鼠找20块奶酪。

original: Find my pet rat, please.  I don't think it got far away.
translation: 请找到我的宠物老鼠。我不认为它离我们很远。

original: Find new students for Johnny's boxing school.
translation: 为约翰尼的拳击学校找新学生。

original: Find sword of the great hero Kentaro.
translation: 找到伟大英雄肯塔罗的剑。

original: Find the informer, who was infiltrated to 'Flame Knuckle' school, and talk to him.
translation: 找到那个潜入“火焰指节”学校的线人，和他谈谈。

original: First, you need to find proper uniform.  You should wear Karate Gi and Geta to start your training.  By the way, this is strictly not allowed, but in this dire circumstances, you can 'borrow' uniform from any not-any-more student.
translation: 首先，你需要找到合适的制服。你应该穿空手道球衣开始训练。顺便说一句，这是严格不允许的，但在这种可怕的情况下，你可以'借'制服从任何不再有学生。

original: Flame Knuckle leader suddenly attacked you. Maybe this is part of the training?
translation: 火焰指节头目突然攻击你。也许这是训练的一部分？

original: Flame Knuckle sounds cool! If you are sure about it, lead me to their leader, so he can accept me.
translation: 火焰指节听起来很酷！如果你确定的话，带我去见他们的首领，这样他就可以接受我了。

original: Flame Knuckle's Leader asked you to find new students for his school.
translation: 火焰指节的领导让你为他的学校找新学生。
火焰指节的首领被砍下的头。

original: Funny guy, are you?  Guards, kick his ass!
translation: 有趣的家伙，是吗？卫兵，踢他的屁股！

original: Funny guy, are you? Boys, let's teach this <name_b> some manners!
translation: 有趣的家伙，是吗？孩子们，让我们教这个<name_b>孩子一些礼貌！

original: Gather <color_light_blue>20 ammonium nitrate</color>, <color_light_blue>0.3L gasoline</color>, <color_light_blue>15 hops</color>, <color_light_blue>5 <zombie> pheromone</color>.
translation: 采集<color_light_blue> 20硝酸铵</color>，<color_light_blue>0.3L汽油</color_light_blue>，<color_light_blue>15啤酒花</color_light_blue>，<color_light_blue>5<zombie>信息素</color>。

original:
Gather:
 <color_light_blue>12 pinecones</color>
 <color_light_blue>8 birchbarks</color>
 <color_light_blue>4 cattail stalks</color>
 <color_light_blue>2 lotus flowers</color>

Gather:
 <color_light_blue>20 tobacco leaves</color>,
 <color_light_blue>40 coffee beans</color>,
 <color_light_blue>0.75L of whiskey</color>,
 <color_light_blue>12 chunks of mutant meat</color>.
Get me to my family grave
Gladly I’m not alone in this shithole.  There are enough of <name_g>s around: part my staff, part random survivors looking for food, booze, shelter or work for paying for all that.
translation: 很高兴我不是一个人在这鬼地方。周围有足够的<name_g>人：一部分是我的员工，一部分是随机生还者寻找食物、酒、住所或工作来支付所有这些。

original: Go search for lone survivors hiding in their basement or something.
translation: 去找躲在地下室里的孤独的幸存者。

original: Good to see you again. Unfortunately for me, that moneylender guy don't let me go so easily.  He sent me his goon with a message recently.  He said that if I want to keep my gym and my head, I need to repay him, and that guy convinced me, that his boss is serious about it.  Now I'm a little scared.  If only I could somehow deal with this problem…
translation: 很高兴再次见到你。对我来说不幸的是，那个放债的家伙不那么容易放我走。他最近给我发了一条消息。他说如果我想保住我的身体和脑袋，我需要报答他，那家伙让我相信，他的老板是认真的。现在我有点害怕。如果我能解决这个问题…

original: Good, <very> good, my student.  Now my school have a chance to rise again!  Take this belt, you deserve it.
translation: 好，<very>好，我的学生。现在我的学校有机会再次崛起！带上这条腰带，你应得的。

original: Good, <very> good. Nice catch out there, they can be good asset for me. I'll treat them with care, he-he. Now go play outside, <name_g>.
translation: 好，<very>好。抓得好，对我来说是个好资产。我会小心对待他们的，他。现在出去玩，<name_g>。

original: Good, good.  I was looking for someone like you.  Last part of my missions was to find someone worthy, so I can teach him Kentaro's ancient fighting style.  But be warned, training will be hard.  So, if you think you're ready, we can start.
translation: 很好，很好。我在找像你这样的人。我的任务的最后一部分是找到一个有价值的人，这样我就可以教他肯塔罗古老的战斗风格。但要注意的是，训练会很困难。所以，如果你觉得你准备好了，我们可以开始了。

original: Good, good.  I'll wait here for your return.
translation: 很好，很好。我在这里等你回来。

original: Good, good.  This is the armor that you found for me.  Put it on, and then speak to me.
translation: 很好，很好。这是你为我找到的盔甲。戴上它，然后跟我说话。

original: Good, let's go back to RC.
Good, my student, good.  Here, you can take this book.
translation: 很好，我的学生，很好。给，你可以拿这本书。

original: Good, thank you.  I just need some time to… Oh, it's right on the top, ha-ha.  Let's see… So, now I know where to find him.
translation: 很好，谢谢。我只是需要一些时间…哦，就在上面，哈哈。让我看看…所以，现在我知道在哪里可以找到他了。

original: Good.  He will be there for a week at least.  If you want to get to him before dealing with his other crooks, ask me how, I've got an idea…
translation: 很好。他至少要在那里呆一个星期。如果你想在对付其他骗子之前找到他，问我怎么做，我有个主意…

original: Good.  Here's our base.  Go talk to him about your joining.  Oh, almost forgot, take this.  Show this to the guy at the entrance, or he'll not let you in.
translation: 很好。这是我们的基地。去和他谈谈你的加入。哦，差点忘了，拿着这个。把这个拿给入口处的人看，否则他不会让你进去的。

original: Good.  I don't know where exactly, though.  Maybe, search at the top floors?
translation: 很好。不过，我不知道具体在哪里。也许，在顶层搜索？

original: Good.  I need to find a crashed heli, and you are going to help me find it.  No objections.  It crashed in nearby field.  I need an information that was on that heli.  That information is <very> valuable for my mission.  Let's search for it. Time is working against us, s we want to make this as fast as possible, do we, <name_g>?
translation: 很好。我需要找到一架坠毁的直升机，你要帮我找到它。没有异议。它坠毁在附近的田地里。我需要那架直升机上的信息。这些信息对我的任务<very>有价值。让我们搜索它。时间对我们不利，我们想尽可能快地完成这件事，是吗，<name_g>？

original: Good.  Last task.  We need to contact a special agent that is working in this area to finish my mission.  For that we need to get a special code to contact him with radio.  Lead me to the meeting point, where we can find more info.
translation: 很好。最后一个任务。我们需要联系一个在这个地区工作的特工来完成我的任务。为此我们需要一个特殊的密码来联系他。带我到集合点，在那里我们可以找到更多的信息。

original: Good.  Next task.  We need to get a highly classified information from military bunker nearby.  Lead me to that bunker.  We will work together on cracking it, but don't forget about time!
translation: 很好。下一个任务。我们需要从附近的军事掩体得到高度机密的情报。带我去那个地堡。我们将一起努力破解它，但别忘了时间！

original: Good.  See that building?  That's our meeting point.  Search for the note or something inside.  It got to be written somewhere.
translation: 很好。看到那栋楼了吗？那是我们的汇合点。在里面找纸条或什么东西。一定要写在什么地方。

original: Good.  Show it to me.  So, here you are, you dirty bastard.  Who's laughing now, huh?  Ha-ha! Hah… Wait a minute.  Green eyes, potato nose, scar under left eye, dental print looks like his, but… It's a wyrm, not a dragon!  ARGH, what a trickster!  So, now we know that we put behind bars someone else, and there's the chance he's still alive.  That's bad news, indeed.  I need to think about it.
translation: 很好。给我看看。所以，给你，你这个肮脏的混蛋。现在谁在笑啊？哈哈！哈…等一下。绿色的眼睛，土豆鼻子，左眼下的伤疤，牙印看起来像他的，但是…那是一只wyrm，不是一条龙！啊，真是个骗子！所以，现在我们知道我们把另一个人关进了监狱，他很可能还活着。这确实是个坏消息。我需要考虑一下。

original: Good.  There's only one catch: I don't know exactly where it is.  I only know that that politician lived in this state.  Maybe he hid it in his mansion?  Check all mansions nearby.  After that, we can talk about your reward, youngling.
translation: 很好。只有一个问题：我不知道它到底在哪里。我只知道那个政客住在这个州。也许他把它藏在他的豪宅里了？检查附近所有的豪宅。在那之后，我们可以谈谈你的奖励，年轻人。

original: Good.  Wait for a while, I need some time to look around and find something that may lead us to him…
translation: 很好。等一下，我需要一些时间四处看看，找到一些能让我们找到他的东西…

original: Good. First one is easy. Kill hacker in his basement.
translation: 很好。第一个很简单。在地下室杀了黑客。

original: Good. I got a contract on some <name_b> who lives in sewers. Don't know who or for what someone wants him dead. Sounds easy enough for me.
translation: 很好。我和一个住在下水道的<name_b>签了合同。不知道有人想让他死是为了什么。听起来很简单。

original: Good. I got a contract on some corrupted cop. Find him. He has a wooden hand. According to my sources, he got trapped in one of the FEMA camps.
translation: 很好。我和一个腐败警察签了合同。找到他。他有一只木头手。据我所知，他被困在联邦应急管理局的一个集中营里。

original: Good. I'll slip a word about you to my boss. You can meet him downstairs.
translation: 很好。我要把你的事告诉我老板。你可以在楼下见他。

original: Good. The last mission will be some top manager or CEO or <swear> knows who of <swear> knows what.
translation: 很好。最后一个任务将是一些高层管理人员或首席执行官或<swear>知道谁知道什么。

original: Good. Wait for him there.  I'm sure he'll come for another sleepover.
translation: 很好。在那里等他。我肯定他会再来过夜的。

original: HOOVA!  That's what I'm talking about.  We showed them who's the bosses around here!  Thanks, I owe you one.  I think it will cool his head for a while.
translation: 万岁！这就是我要说的。我们告诉他们谁是这里的老板！谢谢，我欠你一个人情。我想这会让他冷静一会儿。

original: HOW DARE YOU SAY SOMETHING LIKE THAT!!!
He looks like a nice bh. Maybe you should not let him die?
translation: 他看起来像个好人。也许你不该让他死？

original: He was alive, but I couldn't get him here in one peace.  I'm sorry.
translation: 他还活着，但我没能让他平静下来。我很抱歉。

original: He was dead, I couldn't do anything.  I'm sorry.
translation: 他死了，我什么都做不了。我很抱歉。

original: He will be guarded, and probably would try to buy his life if you talk to him. Remember, no talking to your victims!
translation: 他会被保护起来，如果你和他说话，他可能会试图收买他的生命。记住，不要和受害者说话！

original: He's <very> dangerous man, I assure you, so take care!
translation: 他是<very>危险的人物，我向你保证，所以保重！

original: He's <very> dangerous, so you might want not to approach him directly.  The more distance you have between you and him, the better.
translation: 他<very>危险，所以你可能不想直接接近他。你和他之间的距离越远越好。

original: He-he.  I believed in you, pal.  *Berry took a large sip*  Here's the cash I promised you.  Spend it well, he-he.
translation: 他，他。我相信你，伙计，贝瑞喝了一大口，这是我答应你的钱。好好花，他。

original: He-he.  I believed in you, pal.  *Berry took a large sip*  Here's the cash I promised.  Spend it well, he-he.
translation: 他，他。我相信你，伙计，贝瑞喝了一大口，这是我答应给你的钱。好好花，他。

original: Hell, we will teach those bastards some proper manners… <speech_warning>  I think they're here!  Let's go kick their asses!
translation: 见鬼，我们要教那些混蛋一些礼貌…<言语警告>我想他们来了！我们去踢他们的屁股！

original: Hello there, <name_g>.  I'm Captain Cost, CIA.  Do you want to help your government?
translation: 你好，<name_g>。我是Cost上尉，中情局。你想帮助你的政府吗？

original: Hello there, student! Ready to learn the way of Iron Palm?
translation: 你好，学生！准备好学习铁掌之道了吗？

original: Hello. Do you want to give me something to drink?
translation: 你好。你想给我点喝的吗？

original: Help Johnny to defend his gym.
translation: 帮助约翰尼保卫他的体育馆。

original: Help me to get to cemetery, where my family buried
translation: 帮我去墓地，我的家人埋葬的地方

original: Here's the money for that shotgun.
Hey who are you?  Where did you come from?  I don't know you!  What do you want from me?
translation: 嘿，你是谁？你从哪里来的？我不认识你！你想从我这里得到什么？

original: Hey, 'pal', maybe you want to compensate my time with something of worth NOW?
translation: 嘿，伙计，也许你现在想用一些有价值的东西来补偿我的时间？

original: Hey, I'm not in the mood right now! Go away!
Hey, pal, I said I'm sorry!

Hey, pal, I've got an emergency here.  You helped me before, so I put my trust in you on this!  A few days ago, my brother went to forest to meet with some guys that are agreed to help with… let’s say, with some 'work'.  Problem is, something strange happened at the meeting.  We spoke by the radio with my brother, and the last thing I heard was loud rumbling and sounds of fight.  I think they killed him, pal… Please, check the meeting spot, and if he's still alive, bring him back to me!
translation: 嘿，伙计，我这里有急事。你以前帮过我，所以我信任你！几天前，我哥哥去森林里见了一些人，他们同意帮忙……比如说，做些“工作”。问题是，会上发生了一些奇怪的事情。我们通过无线电和我哥哥通话，我听到的最后一声是隆隆声和打斗声。我想是他杀了他，伙计…拜托，检查一下会面地点，如果他还活着，把他带回来给我！

original: Hey, pal, don't try to fool me!

Hey, pal, glad you still alive.  Listen, I have another task for you.  Have you heard about 'Uncle Ben's Mustang'?  It's the best moonshine in the entire state!  Sadly, there is a high chance that Ol' Benny is dead by now… BUT!  I got this nice map with all 'shady' places in the woods with different spots for moonshiners to meet.  So, I want YOU to visit one of the places, and maybe grab me a few bottles if you find any… Hey, hey, don't go!  I'll share!  Fine, I'll even give you some nice looking trader banknotes.  So, what do you say?
translation: 嘿，伙计，很高兴你还活着。听着，我还有一个任务要做。你听说过“本叔叔的野马”吗？这是全州最好的私酒！可悲的是，老本尼现在很有可能已经死了…但是！我有一张很好的地图，上面有树林里所有的阴凉处，有不同的地点供月光族聚会。所以，我要你去参观其中一个地方，如果你找到的话，也许可以给我拿几瓶……嘿，嘿，别走！我来分享！好吧，我甚至会给你一些好看的商业钞票。那么，你怎么说？

original: Hey, pal, you call this a vodka?!
translation: 嘿，伙计，你管这叫伏特加？！

original: Hmm, if you put it that way, I'll tell you something interesting.  I think your <name_g> asked you to bring back my head.  How do I know?  That cop <name_b> just wants to screw you and loot my basement!  I have a secret storage room in there that opens only with retinal scan, and he will do anything to get to that room.  Tell you what, if you kill that <name_b>, I'll open it for you.  Anything that I'll leve behind me, will be yours.  What do you say, <name_g>?
translation: 嗯，如果你这么说的话，我会告诉你一些有趣的事情。我想你的<name_g>让你把我的头拿回来。我怎么知道？那个警察<name_b>只想干掉你，抢劫我的地下室！我在那里有一个秘密储藏室，只有视网膜扫描才能打开，他会不择手段地去那个房间。告诉你，如果你杀了那个，我会帮你打开的。我身后的一切都是你的。你怎么说？

original: Hmm, maybe you want to change your mind?
Hmm… I'm not ready.  My mission is not finished.  Yet.
translation: 嗯…我还没准备好。我的任务还没完成。但是。

original: How can I become your student?
translation: 我怎样才能成为你的学生？

original: How did you managed to survive?
How rude, I'll kick your ass!
translation: 真没礼貌，我要踢你的屁股！

original: Huh, that's not my rat!  My rat returned to me a few minutes ago!
translation: 哈，那不是我的老鼠！我的老鼠几分钟前又回来了！

original: Huh?  What are you talking about?  You do not recognize american dollars?  For that money you can buy a lot more booze than you brought me!
translation: 呵呵？你在说什么？你不认识美元吗？用这些钱你可以买比你给我带来的更多的酒！

original: I already taught you all I knew.
translation: 我已经把我知道的都教给你了。

original: I am a captain of military force of the US and A!
translation: 我是美国的一名陆军上尉，也是一名军人！

original: I came from Japan to retrieve ancient relics from the past: parts of armor of Kentaro the Great.
translation: 我从日本来是为了取回过去的古代文物：健太郎大帝盔甲的一部分。

original: I didn’t doubt in you.  Hold this belt as a symbol of your entry into Iron Palm School!  Go, and don't come to me until you complete your task!
translation: 我不怀疑你。拿着这条腰带作为你进入铁掌学校的标志！去吧，在你完成任务之前别来找我！

original: I don't have time for this. Name your price.
translation: 我没时间做这个。说出你的价格。

original: I don't know what that means, but I don't like you.  I'm leaving.
translation: 我不知道那是什么意思，但我不喜欢你。我要走了。

original: I don't know what to say, my student.  Just take this belt.  You earned it with your blood and tears.  If you want to get extra training, talk to me.  I'll teach you all our school secrets as best as I can!
translation: 我不知道该说什么，我的学生。带上这条皮带。你用你的血和眼泪赢得了它。如果你想得到额外的训练，跟我说。我会尽我所能教你我们所有的学校秘密！

original: I don't know what to say.  You saved my ass, and know I'm in eternal debt to you!  Thank you.
translation: 我不知道该说什么。你救了我的命，知道我永远欠你的债！非常感谢。

original: I don't know what you will face there, but God will help you!
translation: 我不知道你会面对什么，但是上帝会帮助你的！

original: I don't want to help you anymore.
I got a book for you.
I got a turret for you.
translation: 我给你准备了一个炮塔。

original: I have a unfinished task. Let's talk about this later.
translation: 我有一个未完成的任务。我们晚点再谈。

original: I have this cool cop bot right here.  Price is 200 merch.  Are you interested?
translation: 我这里有个很酷的警察机器人。价格是200美克。你有兴趣吗？

original: I have this cool martial book right here.  Price is 1200 merch.  Are you interested?
translation: 我这有本很酷的武功书。价格是1200默克。你有兴趣吗？

original: I have this cool shotgun CBM right here.  Price is 400 merch.  Are you interested?
translation: 我这里有一把很酷的猎枪。价格是400美克。你有兴趣吗？

original: I hope you bring me something worth my attention.
translation: 我希望你带给我一些值得我注意的东西。

original: I hope you now how to deal with alligators. There are a lot of them in city sewers. [*chuckles*]
translation: 我希望你现在怎么对付鳄鱼。城市下水道里有很多。[*咯咯笑*]

original: I knew you wouldn't refuse such a deal, pal.  I'll wait for you right here!
translation: 我就知道你不会拒绝这样的交易，伙计。我就在这里等你！

original: I know little about their base, but they have a bunch of crooks that joined them for protection, a few trainers for training new students, maybe something more.  Oh, if you see the guys with masks.  They are his tops, so be <very> careful while dealing with them.
translation: 我对他们的基地知之甚少，但他们有一群加入他们保护的骗子，一些训练新学生的教练，也许还有更多。如果你看到戴面具的人。它们是他的上衣，所以在处理它们时要<very>小心。

original: I know you can do it! God bless you!
translation: 我知道你能行！上帝保佑你！

original: I know you wouldn't refuse, <name_g>.  I'll wait.
translation: 我知道你不会拒绝的，<name_g>。我会等的。

original: I learned all from it. You can take it now. Good luck!
translation: 我从中学到了一切。你现在可以接受了。祝你好运！

original: I learned all from this book. You can take it.
translation: 我从这本书中学到了一切。你可以接受。

original: I learned all from this book. You can take it. Good luck.
translation: 我从这本书中学到了一切。你可以接受。祝你好运。

original: I like your attitude.  Show them the true path of the Iron Palm!
translation: 我喜欢你的态度。向他们展示铁掌的真实路径！

original: I need rest, <name_g>.  Let's do it sometime later.
translation: 我需要休息，<name_g>。我们以后再做吧。

original: I need to warm myself somehow.  Find me at least 30 planks.
translation: 我得暖暖身子。给我找至少30块木板。

original: I said I don't have time for chit-chat!
I still want to kick your ass!
I teach only those who help holy warriors in need.  Do you help holy warriors in need?
translation: 我只教那些帮助有需要的神圣战士的人。你有帮助那些需要帮助的神圣战士吗？

original: I teach only those who helped me. Did you helped me?
translation: 我只教那些帮助过我的人。你帮过我吗？

original: I teach only those who helped my school.  Did you helped my school?
translation: 我只教那些帮助过我学校的人。你帮过我的学校吗？

original: I understand.  I'll return when I get the uniform!
translation: 我理解。我拿到制服就回来！

original: I was a teacher, always wanted to be rich! Now I can fulfill my dream!
translation: 我是个老师，一直想发财！现在我可以实现我的梦想了！

original: I'll be free in a few hours.  Until then, you can talk to my boss.
translation: 我几小时后有空。在那之前，你可以和我老板谈谈。

original: I'll be honest with you. [*he shows you his arm with large bite mark*] I think you understand what that means. I tried to heal it, but for some reason, the mark wont go, and the pain wont stop, no matter how i tried. I think I'll become one of them. I DONT what to become one of that thing…
translation: 我跟你说实话。[*他给你看他的手臂上有一个大大的咬痕*]我想你明白这意味着什么。我试着治愈它，但不知为什么，伤痕不会消失，疼痛也不会停止，不管我怎么努力。我想我会成为他们中的一员。我不知道该怎么做…

original: I'll teach you, for sure, but only after I'll deal with all my problems.
translation: 当然，我会教你的，但只有在我解决了所有问题之后。

original: I'm a collector, I collect books.  Also, I need to protect my property.  For that, I need automated turrets.  Turrets with M240 are fine.  Bring me enough books and I'll open my store to you.  Bring me enough books and turrets, and I'll open my premium store for you.
translation: 我是个收藏家，我收集书籍。另外，我需要保护我的财产。为此，我需要自动炮塔。带有M240的炮塔很好。给我带足够的书，我就给你开门。给我带足够的书和炮塔，我会为你开我的高级商店。

original: I'm afraid that I can't teach you anything.
translation: 恐怕我什么都教不了你。

original: I'm empty right now.  Come back in a few days.
translation: 我现在空着。过几天再来。
我很高兴一切都结束了。

original: I'm here because of some officer that wants you dead.  He looks kind of suspicious, so I want to learn the whole story.
translation: 我来这里是因为某个警官想要你死。他看起来有点可疑，所以我想了解整个情况。

original: I'm here to kick your ass!
I'm here to talk about Johnny's debt.
translation: 我是来谈约翰尼的债务的。

original: I'm just a guy.  Nothing more, nothing else.
translation: 我只是个男人。没别的了，没别的了。

original: I'm just a regular hobo.  That's all.
translation: 我只是个普通的流浪汉。这就是全部。

original: I'm not in the mood right now. Go away.
I'm only talking to my students about my problems!
translation: 我只是在和我的学生谈论我的问题！
我准备好了，主人。下一步是什么？

original: I'm sorry, master!  Please don't kill me!
translation: 对不起，师父！请不要杀我！

original: I'm sorry, master, but you must die.

I'm the True Warrior of God!  I fight evil whenever I see one!  I was called to this land to clean it from it's filth!  Humanity has covered itself with sin and now they pay the price!  But I lived all my life as pure and sinless as I could, and the God saved me from this curse of walking dead!
translation: 我是上帝真正的战士！每当我看到一个恶魔，我就和它战斗！我被召唤到这片土地来清除它的污秽！人类用罪恶掩盖了自己，现在他们付出了代价！但我一辈子都尽可能的纯洁和无罪，上帝救了我脱离了行尸走肉的诅咒！

original: If you didn't notice, old world is dead, and old currencies have little to none value now.  Heck, I doubt I can found someone who will want to trade something for this green paper.
translation: 如果你没有注意到，旧世界已经死了，旧货币现在几乎没有价值。见鬼，我怀疑我能不能找到一个愿意用什么东西来换取这份绿皮书的人。

original: If you want to become a great warrior, that will be song about in the legends, you need to learn how to deal with problems by yourself!
translation: 如果你想成为一个伟大的战士，那将是传说中的歌曲，你需要学会如何处理自己的问题！

original: If you want to become a great warrior, that will be sung about in the legends, you need to learn how to deal with problems by yourself!
translation: 如果你想成为一个伟大的战士，那将在传说中传唱，你需要学会如何处理自己的问题！

original: If you want to join us, go talk to my boss.  He needs more people for our cause.  We will give you food, shelter, protection and teach you how to protect yourself.
translation: 如果你想加入我们，去和我老板谈谈。他需要更多的人来支持我们的事业。我们会给你食物，庇护所，保护你，教你如何保护自己。

original: If you want to travel with me, let's go.
translation: 如果你想和我一起旅行，我们走吧。

original: Iron Palm sounds cool! If you are sure about it, lead me to their leader, so he can accept me.
translation: 铁掌听起来很酷！如果你确定的话，带我去见他们的首领，这样他就可以接受我了。
听起来很危险。我会过去的。
听起来很危险。我会过去的。

original: It's a matter of principle.  You got something for me?
translation: 这是原则问题。你有东西给我吗？

original: It's a place for lost souls, who are still struggle to survive in this hard times.
translation: 这是一个为迷失的灵魂，谁仍然挣扎在这个艰难的时代生存的地方。

original: It's an easy job, really. Just don't forget to move at night.
translation: 真的，这工作很简单。别忘了晚上搬家。

original: It's been a fun ride. We had so much fun together. I just wanted to have fun for the last time, and you were there to help me with it. But now, I'm asking you to help me for the last time…
translation: 旅途很愉快。我们在一起玩得很开心。我只想最后一次玩得开心，而你却在那里帮我。但是现在，我请求你最后一次帮助我…

original: It's good to see another true warrior.  I'm pleased to see that you succeed in this task.  Now I can teach you my secret art.
translation: 很高兴看到另一个真正的战士。我很高兴看到你成功地完成了这项任务。现在我可以教你我的秘密艺术了。

original: It's good to see another true warrior.  I'm pleased to see that you succeed in this task.  Now I need some rest.  Let's talk later.
translation: 很高兴看到另一个真正的战士。我很高兴看到你成功地完成了这项任务。现在我需要休息一下。我们晚点再说吧。

original: It's good to see another warrior of the light.  I'm pleased to see that you succeed in this task.
translation: 很高兴看到另一个光明战士。我很高兴看到你成功地完成了这项任务。

original: It's good to see my best student again.
translation: 很高兴再次见到我最好的学生。

original: It's time to end the Flame Knuckle once and for all.
translation: 是时候彻底结束这段感情了。

original: I… understand… I'll help you… for the last time…
translation: 我…明白…我会帮你…最后一次…

original: Kids these days, no respect for elders…
translation: 现在的孩子，不尊重长辈…

original: Kill 100 zombies before you get sober.
translation: 在你清醒之前杀死100个僵尸。

original: Kill 200 zombies before you get sober.
translation: 在你清醒之前杀死200个僵尸。

original: Kill 35 zombie brutes before you get sober.
translation: 在你清醒之前杀死35个僵尸。

original: Kill rat king and his pack, so I can have a normal sleep in this place.
translation: 杀了老鼠王和他的手下，这样我就可以在这里正常睡觉了。

original: Knight asked you to find special relic, the remains of some priest that lived in this land a few centuries ago.
translation: 奈特要你找到特别的遗物，几个世纪前住在这片土地上的某个牧师的遗骸。

original: Knight asked you to help Father Randolph to lift his curse.
translation: 奈特让你帮伦道夫神父解除诅咒。

original: Knight asked you to prove that you are true warrior of the light by killing 100 zombies.
translation: 骑士要求你通过杀死100个僵尸来证明你是真正的光之战士。

original: Large folder full of classified military papers.
translation: 一个大文件夹，里面装满了军事机密文件。

original: Large folder full of police records.
translation: 装满警察记录的大文件夹。

original: Large plastic jug with sticker, there's a picture of mustang horse on it. Text on the top of the sticker: 'Best before…', further text unreadable.
translation: 有贴纸的大塑料罐，上面有野马的照片。贴纸顶部的文字：“Best before…”，其他文字无法阅读。

original: Leave me alone, you creep.  Damn kids, always making fun of old and weak ladies…
translation: 离我远点，你这个混蛋。该死的孩子，总是取笑年老体弱的女人…

original: Let me see what you keep behind the counter.
translation: 让我看看你放在柜台后面的东西。

original: Live and newer come back.  If I see your face one more time, <ill_kill_you>.
translation: 活着回来。如果我再看到你的脸，<ill_kill_you>。

original: Look outside and tell me what you see there.  I see plague, plague upon another plague that was sent to our world to purge it from its sins.  If you want to help me fight this plague, and to clean this world from it, I want you to prove me that you are true warrior of the light.  Kill 100 <zombies> and return to me.
translation: 看看外面，告诉我你看到了什么。我看见瘟疫，瘟疫在另一个瘟疫上，那瘟疫被送到我们的世界去，要把它从罪恶中除掉。如果你想帮助我抗击这场瘟疫，并将这个世界从瘟疫中清除，我想让你向我证明你是真正的光之战士。杀死100个僵尸然后回到我身边。

original: Look, first time I saw you, I noticed you stance, how you react on danger…
translation: 听着，我第一次见到你，我注意到你的立场，你对危险的反应…

original: Look, pal, I need to steep my throat, so bring me a bottle of vodka, please.  I'll pay you.
translation: 听着，伙计，我得把嗓子咽下去，请给我拿瓶伏特加来。我会付钱给你的。

original: Look, right now I can only think about one thing, and that's definitely not about teaching, OK?
translation: 听着，现在我只能想一件事，那绝对不是关于教学的，好吗？

original: Make it quick.  I don't have time for chit-chat!
Maybe I just kick your ass?

translation: 也许我应该重新考虑一下。。。

original: Maybe if I help you with something you'll tell me more?
translation: 如果我帮你做点什么，你能告诉我更多吗？

original: Maybe you want to teach me something cool, master?
translation: 也许你想教我一些很酷的东西，师父？

original:
Mod adds 'Wandering Masters', NPCs that can 'teach' player martial arts after completing their quest line.
Check mod folder for more information.
translation:
国防部增加了“游荡大师”，NPC可以“教”玩家完成任务线后的武术。
查看mod文件夹了解更多信息。

original: Move like a butterfly, sting like a bee!
translation: 像蝴蝶一样动，像蜜蜂一样刺！

original: Nice one, student!  That will teach them not to mess with me, with my school and my students!
translation: 不错，学生！这将教会他们不要惹我，惹我的学校和学生！

original: Nice, nice.  Take this, you earned it.
translation: 很好，很好。拿着这个，这是你应得的。

original: Nice.  Consider yourself freed from your friends debt, he-he.  If you want to earn more money, or spend it, talk to me.
translation: 不错。他说，把自己从朋友的债务中解脱出来吧。如果你想赚更多的钱，或者花更多的钱，跟我说。

original: Nice.  Consider yourself freed from your friends debt, he-he.  If you want to trade, talk to me.
translation: 不错。他说，把自己从朋友的债务中解脱出来吧。如果你想交易，跟我说。

original: Nice. I can teach you now if you want.
translation: 不错。如果你愿意，我现在可以教你。

original: Nice. Talk to me, please. I have something to tell you.
translation: 不错。请和我谈谈。我有事要告诉你。

original: No, I'm a cop, and I must help my government.
translation: 不，我是警察，我必须帮助我的政府。

original: No, ha-ha, it's an accident, really.
translation: 不，哈哈，这是个意外，真的。
不是我喜欢的类型，抱歉。

original: Not under roof.  Why do you ask?
translation: 不是在屋顶下。你为什么问？

original: Nothing right now, <name_g>, but I'm making a new one.  Ask me later.
translation: 现在没什么，<name_g>，但我正在做一个新的。以后再问我。

original: OK, I have some ideas how to deal with this situation.  We need to track down that bastard and deal with him before he deal with us!  Lead me to his house.  I'm 100% sure he would visit it.  We can get more information there about his location.
translation: 好的，我有一些办法来处理这种情况。我们得先找到那个混蛋，在他对付我们之前先对付他！带我去他家。我百分之百肯定他会去的。我们可以在那里得到更多关于他的位置的信息。

original: OK, I might know where to find him.  I'll give you approximate location of the real Bill.  Find that bastard and kill him.
translation: 好吧，我可能知道在哪儿能找到他。我会给你真实帐单的大概位置。找到那个混蛋杀了他。

original: OK, OK, I'll tell you the truth.  I'm working for China's intelligence.  They dropped me here before releasing this <swear> plague, so that I can send them reports on how deadly it is.  I didn’t know that it will be this bad, <name_g>, it’s <very> terrifying.  My last mission was to just GTFO of here, meet other agent that can organize my extraction to somewhere else.  Please spare me, <name_g>!  I'll give you something <very> valuable if you do, please...
translation: 好吧，好吧，我告诉你真相。我为中国情报局工作。他们在释放<swear>瘟疫之前把我扔到这里，这样我就可以向他们报告它有多致命。我不知道会这么糟，<name_g>，<very>可怕。我的最后一个任务就是离开这里，去见另一个可以组织我去别的地方的特工。请原谅我，<name_g>！如果你愿意，我会给你一些<very>有价值的东西。。。

original: OK, OK, I'll tell you.  The truth is, I was afraid when first <zombies> tried to enter our department, and didn't even notice how I got myself locked up here, in this cell.  Maybe I panicked, and instead of running away, or helping my fellow co-workers, I thought, maybe, this metal bars would protect me.  I'm so ashamed of myself, really.  Officers should be calm in emergencies like this, to help civilians with anything they need, to protect them, but… What done is done.
translation: 好吧，好吧，我告诉你。事实是，当第一批僵尸试图进入我们部门时，我很害怕，甚至没有注意到我是如何把自己关在这里，关在这个牢房里的。也许我惊慌失措，我没有逃跑，也没有帮助同事，我想，也许，这根金属棒能保护我。我真的为自己感到羞耻。在这样的紧急情况下，军官们应该保持冷静，帮助平民做他们需要的任何事情，保护他们，但是……做了什么就做什么。

original: Officer asked you to find him a folder with police reports in PD, located in town nearby.
translation: 警官让你给他找一个文件夹，里面有警方的报告，就在附近的镇上。

original: Officer asked you to kill prisoner Bill, and bring back his head as proof.
translation: 警官让你杀了囚犯比尔，把他的头拿回来作为证据。

original: Officer asked you to kill the real Bill.
translation: 警官让你杀了真正的比尔。

original: Officer asked you to lead him to Bill's house.
translation: 警官让你带他去比尔家。

original: Oh god, thank you, pal!  I'm so happy to see my brother again!  I would not forget your help for, like, forever!
translation: 哦，上帝，谢谢你，朋友！我很高兴再次见到我弟弟！我永远不会忘记你的帮助！

original: Oh, another survivor! <greet> Do you want to learn the way of Flame Knuckle school?
translation: 哦，又一个幸存者！<greet> 你想学习火焰指节学校的方法吗？

original: Oh, are you here t-to k-kill me?! Please don't, please don't!
translation: 哦，你是来杀我的吗？！请不要，请不要！

original: Oh, pal, so how was it?  Is it good?  I know it's good, that's my favorite drink of all time!
translation: 哦，伙计，怎么样？好吗？我知道它很好，那是我一直以来最喜欢的饮料！

original: Oh, that's why that merchant guy gave me a weird look when I offered him… Sorry, pal, I didn’t think about that until now, he-he.  *he smiled*  Next time, I'll give you something of worth.  You have my word!
translation: 哦，这就是为什么那个商人在我向他求婚的时候给了我一个奇怪的眼神…对不起，伙计，我直到现在才想到这个，他。*他笑了，下次，我会给你一些值钱的东西。我向你保证！

original: Ok, ok, I'll play along.  But only if you start calling me 'The Chosen One'! [*chuckles*]
translation: 好吧，好吧，我一起玩。但前提是你开始叫我“被选中的人”！[*咯咯笑*]

original: Okay, I admit your victory.  Now let's take a break.
translation: 好吧，我承认你赢了。现在让我们休息一下。

original: Okay, I'll pretend to believe you.  Listen carefully, I don't have much time.  Tell the master to check drop point 5.  I left all the necessary information there.  And one more thing, tell him that… <combat_noise_warning>  <swear!> I was tracked!  Ru…
translation: 好吧，我假装相信你。仔细听，我时间不多。告诉船长检查下降点5。我把所有必要的信息都留在那里了。还有一件事，告诉他…<对抗噪音警告><swear!>我被跟踪了！你…

original: Okay, now I need some time for all this stuff to brew in my secret bottle… according to my estimates, it will take all day. Come back later.
translation: 好吧，现在我需要一些时间让这些东西在我的秘密瓶子里冲泡……据我估计，要花一整天的时间。晚点再来。

original: One wrong move and you're dead!
translation: 一个错误的举动，你就死定了！
伙计…我会想念我哥哥的…

original: Permition granted! Go forward, and don't touch anything, or you'll regret it, <name_g>!
translation: 准许！往前走，不要碰任何东西，否则你会后悔的，<name_g>！

original: Phew, that was a close one! I owe you one there, <name_g>. Let me just catch my breath. Talk to me later.
translation: 呸，差一点！我欠你一个，<name_g>。让我喘口气。晚点再跟我说。
警察老师砍下了他的头。

original: Prove that you are true warrior of the light
translation: 证明你是真正的光之战士

original: Relax, I'm not going to hurt you.  I'm from Iron Palm master.
translation: 别紧张，我不会伤害你的。我是铁掌大师。

original: Say, do you continue brewing something?

Second item: Kentaro's helmet.  Some fool thought that it's just a regular helmet and sold it at his local pawn shop.  FOOL!  It cost way more than he could ever get from there!  So, go there, youngling, find his helmet and bring it to me!
translation: 第二件：肯塔罗的头盔。有个傻瓜以为这只是普通的头盔，就在当地的当铺里卖了。傻瓜！这比他从那里得到的要贵得多！所以，去那里，年轻人，找到他的头盔，拿给我！

original: Severed head of the 'real' Prisoner Bill
translation: “真正的”囚犯法案的头像被砍掉了

original: So the next swill is going to be a little exotic.  I'm not sure about my guesses, but I think the effect can be enhanced by adding a little <zombie> pheromone… why are you looking at me like that?  I'm not kidding!  This time I need: ammonium nitrate, 20 pieces; gasoline, 0.3L; hops, 15 pieces; <zombie> pheromone, 5 pieces.  Bring me and I'll try to brew something from this.
translation: 所以下一个泔水会有点异国情调。我不太清楚我的猜测，但我认为添加一点<zombie>信息素可以增强效果…你为什么这样看着我？我没开玩笑！这次我需要：硝酸铵，20片；汽油，0.3升；啤酒花，15片；<zombie>信息素，5片。带我来，我试着从中酿点什么。

original: So, I got that note for you!  Care to explain why there were a lot of aggressive drones?
translation: 所以，我把那张纸条给你了！想解释一下为什么会有很多攻击性的无人机吗？

original:
So, I've got:
 Army supplies for 225
 Canned food for 20
 Medieval stuff from museum for 280
 Pharmacy for 300
 Rare weapons for 600
 Melee weapons for 140
 Weapons for 350
Don't forget that I work only with hard cash!
translation:
所以，我有
件225美元的军需品

original: So, Johnny sent you?  OK, here's the deal.  Johnny owed me a lot of money before <the_cataclysm>, and I want it back.  You have two options: pay for your <name_g>, 1200 FMCNotes will be enough, or you can help me with satisfying my passion and I'll forget about that fool's debt.  I'm a collector of sort.  If you find rare books in your traveling, bring them to me, maybe then I'll think about trusting you.  Choice is yours.  But don't take too long, or your <name_g> will lose his head, he-he.  Also, you have a choice to help him to lose it… I'll pay you for it, and maybe even let you buy my premium goods.
translation: 约翰尼派你来的？好吧，就这么定了。约翰尼在大灾变前欠我很多钱，我要还回来。你有两个选择：付你的钱，1200块钱就够了，或者你可以帮我满足我的激情，我就忘了那个傻瓜的债务。我是个收藏家。如果你在旅行中发现一些珍贵的书籍，把它们带给我，也许我会考虑相信你。选择权在你。但是不要太久，否则你的<name_g>会失去理智的，他。还有，你可以选择帮助他失去它…我会付钱给你，甚至可能让你买我的高档商品。

original: So, for the next drink I need: pinecone, 12 pieces; birchbark, 8 pieces; cattail stalk, 4 pieces; lotus flower, 2 pieces.  Bring me these ingredients and I'll try to brew something out of it.
translation: 所以，下一杯我需要：松果，12片；桦皮，8片；蒲茎，4片；莲花，2片。把这些配料给我，我要试着从中煮些东西。

original: So, for the next drink, I need something new: 20 tobacco leaves, 40 coffee beans, 0.75L of whiskey, 12 chunks of mutant meat.  Bring me and I'll try to brew something from this.
translation: 所以，下次喝的时候，我需要一些新东西：20片烟叶，40个咖啡豆，0.75升威士忌，12块变异肉。带我来，我试着从中酿点什么。

original: So, i need help with something. Lead me to nearest bank!
translation: 所以，我需要一些帮助。带我去最近的银行！

original: So, looking for a secret room, aren't you?

So, my student, it's time for real punch!  I managed to locate their base, and even learned that their leader will be there.  I want you to go there, show them the power of the Iron Palm and bring me the head of their leader as proof.  You are my best student, so it wouldn't be difficult for you.
translation: 所以，我的学生，是时候开始真正的拳击了！我设法找到了他们的基地，甚至得知他们的首领也会在那里。我要你去那里，向他们展示铁掌的力量，给我拿他们首领的头像作为证据。你是我最好的学生，所以对你来说不难。

original: So, my student, it's time to resurrect my school.  Bring me 2 new students so I can train them to be the best fighters in the world!
translation: 所以，我的学生，是时候恢复我的学校了。给我带两个新学生来，这样我就能把他们训练成世界上最好的战士了！

original: So, now I have my head back, and my gym as well!  It's time to give this world a chance by reopening my boxing school!  Find me 2 new students, so that I can make them new pair of steel fists!  With them, we could even clean this town from <zombies>!
translation: 所以，现在我的头回来了，我的健身房也回来了！是时候给这个世界一个机会，重新开放我的拳击学校了！给我找两个新同学，让我给他们做一双新的钢拳！有了他们，我们甚至可以清除这个镇上的僵尸！

original: So, now I know where he's been serving sentence, and I want to just check what happened to him… What?  Why don't I just go there and look for myself?  Well, ha-ha, I'm kind of busy with… Defending my PD, ha!  So, if you want to help me, please find Bill.  If he's there, kill him and bring his head as poof.  He have a tattoo on his face that looks like a dragon, so you can’t mistake him for anyone.
translation: 所以，现在我知道他在哪里服刑了，我想看看他发生了什么…什么？我为什么不自己去看看呢？嗯，哈哈，我有点忙着…保护我的警察，哈哈！所以，如果你想帮我，请找比尔。如果他在那里，杀了他，把他的头当屎一样拿来。他脸上有一个像龙的纹身，所以你不能把他当成任何人。
那么，那些“额外”的员工呢？

original: So, what do you need, my brother?
translation: 那么，你需要什么，我的兄弟？

original: So, you are slow reader? No problem, I can teach you!
translation: 那么，你阅读速度慢？没问题，我可以教你！

original: So, you are that new student I was told about? Unfortunately for you, I know everything about you. I think you understand that you are not the first person this old fool sends to us. But you're in luck, today I'm in a good mood, and I'm ready to give you a chance to redeem yourself. Bring that old man's head and I'll think about giving you a chance to join my school.
translation: 你就是我听说的那个新学生？不幸的是，我知道你的一切。我想你知道你不是这个老傻瓜派来的第一个人。但你很幸运，今天我心情很好，我准备给你一个赎罪的机会。把那个老人的头拿来，我会考虑给你一个加入我学校的机会。

original: So, you can't read? No problem, I can teach you!
translation: 所以，你不识字？没问题，我可以教你！

original: So, you chose to lose your head.
translation: 所以，你选择了失去理智。

original: So, you know my name AND how to find me.  Interesting.  I'm listening, but if you say something that I wouldn't like, you will be dead in a second.  Speak.
translation: 所以，你知道我的名字和怎么找到我。很有趣。我在听，但如果你说些我不喜欢的话，你马上就死定了。说吧。

original: So, you stumbled upon me.  I suggest that you leave this place and run away as fast as you can, unless you want to get a new hole in your head.
translation: 所以，你偶然发现了我。我建议你离开这个地方，尽快逃走，除非你想在你的头上再钻一个洞。

original: So, you want to learn how to read fast? No problem, I can teach you!
translation: 那么，你想学习如何快速阅读吗？没问题，我可以教你！

original: So, you want to learn something new? I can teach you how to read faster, or, if you don't know, how to read.
translation: 你想学点新东西吗？我可以教你怎么读得更快，或者，如果你不知道，怎么读。

original: So, you want to learn the secrets of my school? Here, take it, it's all yours, my student. But you know, I'm not feeling that generous to just give you my secrets that easily. Let's dance for a bit, and if you could stand still after that, consider yourself worthy to know the ways of my school.
translation: 你想知道我学校的秘密吗？来，拿着，都是你的，我的学生。但你知道，我不觉得那么慷慨，就这么轻易地告诉你我的秘密。让我们跳一会儿舞，如果你在那之后还能站着不动，你就认为你有资格了解我学校的教学方法。

original: So, you want to learn the way of the sword?  Good.  I can teach you.
translation: 那么，你想学剑法吗？很好。我可以教你。

original: So, you want to lend a hand in my sacred quest?  So be it!  First, Tabi of Kentaro the Great.  Some collector bought it not so long ago, but couldn't make it to his home, and died at the hotel he stayed after returning to this country.  Don’t ask me where I get this information.  Go find it, it's somewhere in that hotel.
translation: 那么，你想帮我完成神圣的任务吗？就这样吧！首先，肯塔罗大帝的塔比。不久前有个收藏家买了它，但没能送到他家，回到这个国家后死在了他住的旅馆里。别问我从哪里得到这些信息。去找，就在那家旅馆的某个地方。

original: So, you want to trade, huh?  Prove me that you are nice fella by helping me with stuff and I'll think about it.  I'm a collector of sort.  If you find rare books in your traveling, bring them to me, maybe then I'll think about trusting you.
translation: 所以，你想交易，嗯？帮我做些事来证明你是个好人，我会考虑的。我是个收藏家。如果你在旅行中发现一些珍贵的书籍，把它们带给我，也许我会考虑相信你。

original: So, you're a cop? Good. This good <name_g>s will lead you where you should be.
translation: 你是警察？很好。这个好的<name_g> s会带你去你该去的地方。

original: Sorry, <name_g>, I don't have anything for you at the moment.
translation: 对不起，<name_g>，我现在没有东西给你。

original: Sorry, I'm here to kill you!
Sorry, pal, I'm not in the mood right now.
translation: 抱歉，伙计，我现在没心情。

original: Sure thing, my <name_g>.  Goodbye… It was a fun ride…
translation: 当然，我的<name_g>。再见…这是一次有趣的旅行…

original: Sure thing. I'll do anything for you.
translation: 当然。我会为你做任何事。

original: Sure, I have some leftovers.  Wanna drink it now?
translation: 当然，我有一些剩菜。想现在喝吗？

original: Take this.  This is one of the school flyers my informer has gave me.  He said that they use it now as invitation tickets.  I hope you can find use for it.  Good luck, student.
translation: 拿着这个。这是我线人给我的学校传单之一。他说他们现在用它当请柬。我希望你能找到它的用处。祝你好运，学生。
和火焰指节的首领谈谈。
测试任务和过时的东西

original: Thank you, pal.  I owe you a big one.  Please hurry!
translation: 谢谢你，伙计。我欠你一大笔钱。请快点！

original: Thank you, pal.  I'll wait for you right here!
translation: 谢谢你，伙计。我就在这儿等你！

original: Thank you, you are truly my <name_g>. Just do it quick, please. And if it's not hard for you, could you please bury me on this cemetery? I want to rest in this grounds, with my parents…
translation: 谢谢你，你真的是我的<name_g>。请快点。如果对你来说不难的话，你能把我葬在这个墓地吗？我想和我的父母在这里休息…

original: Thanks to the information you gave me, I learned that Flame Knuckle is send one of their elites to train a new group of fresh apprentices, and I want you to prevent this.  Find this <name_b>, use your iron palm and make him choke on blood!  What?  What about the students?  I don't give a <swear> damn, do what you want.  Oh yeah, their training will take about 2-4 weeks, so hurry up!  They won't sit there forever!
translation: 多亏了你给我的消息，我才知道火焰指节是派他们的一个精英去训练一批新的学徒，我希望你能阻止这一切。找到这个<name_b>，用你的铁掌，让他被血呛死！什么？学生们呢？我不在乎<swear>，你想怎么做就怎么做。哦，是的，他们的训练大约需要2-4周，所以快点！他们不会永远坐在那里！

original: That was an easy task. This might be harder. Are you still interested?
translation: 那是一件容易的事。这可能更难。你还感兴趣吗？

original: That's nice.  Actually, I lied about secret room, I just don't want to be followed by anyone, especially by some obsessed special agents.  But you held up your end of the agreement, and I respect agreements.  Take this book.  You may find it useful.
translation: 那很好。事实上，我在密室的事上撒了谎，我只是不想被任何人跟踪，特别是被一些痴迷的特工跟踪。但你拖延了你的协议，我尊重协议。拿着这本书。你会发现它很有用。
拳击手约翰尼的健身房
拳击手约翰尼的健身房！

original: The Master has asked you to kill one of the Flame Fist School trainers before he can train a new group of students.
translation: 师父让你先杀了一个火焰拳学校的训练员，然后他才能训练一批新的学生。

original: The last one. It will be hard. I hope you're sure that you can handle it.
translation: 最后一个。会很难的。我希望你确信你能处理好。

original: There's a nasty hobo that came here sometimes, and using my lobby as a place to crash.  He doesn't pay for it, and for some reason, no one wants to shoo him out for me.  If you do it, I’ll see what I can do for you.
translation: 有个讨厌的流浪汉，有时会来这里，把我的大厅当成撞车的地方。他不付钱，出于某种原因，没人愿意替我把他赶出去。如果你这样做，我会看看我能为你做些什么。

original: Third item: Kentaro's armor.  A 35 years ago, his armor was donated to the museum located in this state, so that kids could look at it and… damn those kids.  I hate kids!  Quick, find his armor and bring it back to me!
translation: 第三件：肯塔罗的盔甲。35年前，他的盔甲被捐赠给了位于这个州的博物馆，这样孩子们就可以看到它…该死的那些孩子。我讨厌孩子！快，找到他的盔甲还给我！

original: This NPC could tell you about how they survived the Cataclysm
translation: 这个NPC可以告诉你他们是如何在大灾难中幸存下来的

original: This guys may be dangerous.  I don't know why my brother wanted to mess with them…
translation: 这家伙可能很危险。我不知道为什么我哥哥想和他们乱搞…

original: To be honest, I think you know the world outside far better then me, so I don't have advice for you, except good luck!
translation: 说实话，我觉得你比我更了解外面的世界，所以我没有给你什么建议，除了好运！

original: Try to look at the bar or in some lonely guy's house.
translation: 试着看看酒吧或者某个孤独的人的房子。

original: Umm, why do you have so angry face?  You didn't like it?  Maybe you drank too much?  Here, take this, it can help!
translation: 嗯，你为什么这么生气？你不喜欢吗？也许你喝多了？来，拿着这个，会有帮助的！

original: Under roof.  Why do you ask?
translation: 在屋顶下面。你为什么问？
可以理解，祝你今天愉快。

original: Usually there are not much new people here.  As you may notice, <the_cataclysm> kicked us hard.  Not many survived that.  It’s a sad topic, really.  Let’s talk about something else.
translation: 通常这里的新人不多。你可能注意到，<大灾变>狠狠地踢了我们。没有多少人幸存下来。这真是个悲哀的话题。我们再谈点别的吧。

original: Very well. Consider that you have received my trust. If you still want to become a student of my school, come to me when you have free time.
translation: 很好。认为你得到了我的信任。如果你还想成为我学校的学生，有空就来找我。

original: We do this easy way or a hard way?
translation: 我们做这件事容易还是困难？

original: Well I'm just a regular assassin, really.
translation: 我只是个普通的杀手，真的。

original: Well I’m just a regular boxer, really.  I worked here before <the_cataclysm>, but now I live here, I suppose.
translation: 我只是个普通的拳击手，真的。我在大灾变之前在这里工作过，但我想我现在住在这里。

original: Well done, student.  I knew you would succeed!  Well, tell me all you got… Hmm, that's how it is.  Well, it complicates my job a little.  I need a little time to think about it.  Here, hold this belt, you deserve it.
translation: 干得好，学生。我就知道你会成功！好吧，告诉我你所有的…嗯，就是这样。嗯，这让我的工作有点复杂。我需要一点时间考虑一下。这里，抓住这条腰带，你应得的。

original: Well well, isn't it my savior? Welcome!
translation: 好吧，这不是我的救世主吗？欢迎光临！

original: Well well, you decided to help me?  Okay, listen here, student.  I managed to recruit one of the survivors and persuaded him to join Flame Knuckle and leak all information he could get to me.  The time has come for the next collection of information.  Meet him in the nearby forest, get everything he knows from him and come back here.  Oh yes, our password is 'Berries'.  Don't forget the password!
translation: 你决定帮我？好的，听着，学生。我设法招募了一名幸存者，说服他加入“火焰指节”组织，把他能得到的所有信息都泄露给我。下一次收集信息的时候到了。在附近的森林里遇见他，从他那里得到他所知道的一切，然后回来。哦，是的，我们的密码是“浆果”。别忘了密码！

original: Well, I didn't think that someone would ever lived after that, <name_g>.
translation: 嗯，我没想到会有人在那之后还活着，<name_g>。

original: Well, I don’t have much to say, really.  It was pure luck, I guess.
translation: 嗯，我没什么好说的，真的。我想这纯粹是运气。

original: Well, I was in this cell, minding my own business, but when the lights went out, the emergency system locked the entire PD and I kind of got stuck here.
translation: 嗯，我当时在这间牢房里，管着自己的事，但当灯熄灭时，紧急系统锁定了整个警局，我就被困在这里了。

original: Well, I'm not a good teacher, but since I like you, I can try.  But keep in mind that I will charge a small fee for my work.  I did not leave my way in search of the rarest liquor.  I found a bunch of recipes books of potions, and I need the ingredients to make them.  If you can help me find the ingredients, I will help you learn my fighting style.
translation: 嗯，我不是个好老师，但既然我喜欢你，我可以试试。但请记住，我会为我的工作收取少量费用。我不是为了寻找最稀有的酒而离开的。我找到了一堆药水食谱，我需要制作它们的原料。如果你能帮我找到配料，我会帮你学习我的格斗风格。

original: Well, I'm not sure where it may be, to be honest.  Try to search all the building.
translation: 嗯，老实说，我不知道它可能在哪里。试着搜查整栋楼。

original: Well, if you would like to know, we would have to start before <the_cataclysm>.  There were two schools, The Iron Palm and The Flame Knuckle.  Our Dojo fell apart quickly, my students and even some of my fellow masters left to join the riots.  Almost as if they had forgotten their teachings.  The ones that stayed behind turned into the <zombies> that roam the streets.  The Flame Knuckle somehow didn’t feel the same destruction as we did, they quickly adapted to the new world and expanded their population, offering protection and training to the outside world.  But they kept their grievances and decided to end our dojo, I must prevent this from happening.
translation: 好吧，如果你想知道的话，我们必须在大灾变之前开始。有两个学校，铁掌和火焰指节。我们的道场很快就分崩离析了，我的学生，甚至我的一些师父同伴都去参加暴乱了。好像他们忘记了自己的教诲。留下来的人变成了在街上游荡的僵尸。火焰指节不知何故没有感受到和我们一样的毁灭，他们很快适应了新世界，扩大了人口，为外界提供了保护和训练。但他们保留了他们的不满，决定结束我们的道场，我必须阻止这种事情发生。

original: Well, that’s bad.  Return if you change your mind.
translation: 好吧，那太糟糕了。如果你改变主意就回来。

original: Well, there are also goons of that mone...  Ahem, I probably said too much already.  Let’s change the subject, please.
translation: 好吧，也有那个笨蛋。。。嗯，我可能已经说得太多了。我们换个话题吧。

original: Well, to be honest, I'm just a guy in cool suit…  I took it from museum when <the_cataclysm> started to protect myself, and to somehow remain stable, I started to think of myself as holy warrior, which was sent here to purge the world of <zombies>…  Don't judge me, please…
translation: 好吧，说实话，我只是一个穿酷西装的人…我从博物馆拿的，当大灾变开始保护我自己的时候，为了保持稳定，我开始认为自己是神圣的战士，被派到这里来净化僵尸世界…请不要评判我…

original: Well, what to say, I was always good with numbers, especially while counting money, he-he.  When the <zombies> started to rise, I was here, with my trusted men, in my lovely shelter, protected from outside world.  Somehow, this plague didn't got me, so now I'm just continue to do what I know, and what I'm good at.
translation: 好吧，怎么说呢，我对数字一向很在行，尤其是在数钱的时候，他说。当僵尸开始崛起的时候，我和我信任的人在这里，在我可爱的庇护所里，远离外界。不知何故，这场瘟疫没有抓住我，所以现在我只能继续做我知道的，我擅长的。

original: Well, you know, I don't know if I should tell you, but… Ah, what the hell, I'm a dead man anyway!  Before <the_cataclysm>, I took a lot of money from moneylender to make some improvements for my gym.  At first, things went smoothly, but after that day, as you can guess, my cash flow goes straight to zero.  Somehow, that bastard managed to survive and, can you believe it, asked me to repay my debt!  What for? He would buy himself a nice car or something?!  And there's more!  When I refused to pay, he said that he would sell me as slave to a local bandit band or something.  Hell, I wouldn't turn myself to slave easily, I'll fight for my freedom!  Would you help me?
translation: 嗯，你知道，我不知道我该不该告诉你，但是…啊，见鬼，反正我已经死了！在大灾变之前，我从放债人那里拿了很多钱来改善我的健身房。一开始，一切都很顺利，但那一天之后，你可以猜到，我的现金流直接变成了零。不知怎的，那个混蛋设法活了下来，你能相信吗，还让我还债！为何？他会给自己买辆好车什么的？！还有更多！当我拒绝付款时，他说他要把我作为奴隶卖给当地的一个匪帮什么的。见鬼，我不会轻易把自己变成奴隶，我要为我的自由而战！你能帮我吗？

original: What do you think about transferring to another faction?
translation: 你觉得调到另一个派系怎么样？

original: What staff exactly?  I see only one girl over there.
translation: 具体是什么员工？我只看到一个女孩在那边。

original: What? What secret room?  I don't know what you're talking about!
translation: 什么？什么密室？我不知道你在说什么！

original: What?!  Masters don't lie!  You want to feel my iron fury?  You want to feel REAL PAIN?!
translation: 什么？！主人不说谎！你想感受我钢铁般的愤怒吗？你想感受真正的痛苦？！

original: Where is your cross, my brother?
translation: 你的十字架在哪里，我的兄弟？

original: Where is your cross, my sister?
translation: 你的十字架在哪里，我妹妹？

original: Whew, what a relief!  Now I can sleep at night calmly.  Thank you!
translation: 哇，真是松了一口气！现在我可以在晚上安静地睡觉了。谢谢您！

original: Who are you and what do you want?!
Yeah, I guess they are.  Here, you can take it.
translation: 是的，我想是的。给，你可以拿着。

original: Yeah, I'm interested. Tell me more.
translation: 是的，我很感兴趣。告诉我更多。

original: Yeah, sure, pal.  Sorry.  You can have my old ring, if it helps.
translation: 当然，伙计。对不起。如果有用的话，你可以把我的旧戒指给我。

original: Yeah, we all need some advice, <name_g>.
translation: 是的，我们都需要一些建议，<name_g>。

original: Yeee, <very> nice, <name_g>. Too bad he became a <zombie>, though.
translation: 是的，<very>不错，<name_g>。可惜他变成了僵尸。

original: Yeee, thatswatimtokingbout, <name_g>. You drive! Talk to me when we get there.
translation: 是的，那是关于，<name_g>。你开车！我们到那儿的时候跟我说。

original: Yes, Boxer Johnny needs you. Now go.
translation: 是的，拳击手约翰尼需要你。现在走吧。

original: Yes, Flame Knuckle need you. Now go.
translation: 是的，火焰指节需要你。现在走吧。

original: Yes, Iron Palm needs you. Now go.
translation: 是的，铁掌需要你。现在走吧。

original: Yes, good, good.  You look like a fine warrior in his armor and with his weapon.  Prepare my student.  Training will be hard, but I hope you succeed in it.  And now, the training: fight to the death!  BANZAI!
translation: 是的，很好，很好。你穿上盔甲，拿着武器，看上去像个优秀的战士。让我的学生做好准备。训练很难，但我希望你能成功。现在，训练：战斗至死！班扎伊！

original: Yes, yes, it's his Tabi.  It even smells like him.  Good, good.  One step closer to the end of my quest.
translation: 是的，是的，这是他的桌子。甚至闻起来像他。很好，很好。离我的任务结束又近了一步。

original: Yes, yes, it's his armor.  It even smells like… I need to stop smelling things, do I?  AHEM!  Good, good.  Three steps closer to the end of my quest.
translation: 是的，是的，这是他的盔甲。甚至闻起来…我需要停止闻东西，是吗？啊哼！很好，很好。离我的任务结束还有三步之遥。

original: Yes, yes, it's his helmet.  It even smells like… dirty nerd?!  Ugh, kuso weeab…  AHEM!  Good, good.  Two steps closer to the end of my quest.
translation: 是的，是的，是他的头盔。甚至闻起来像…肮脏的书呆子？！啊，恶作剧…啊哼！很好，很好。离我的任务结束还有两步。

original: Yes, yes, it's his sword!  At last, my quest almost ended!  Good, youngling, good.  And now, the last step: training of someone worthy.  I choose you worthy of training ancient fighting style, that Kentaro the Great and generations of his students kept secret from outside world for centuries!  Talk to me when you're ready, youngling.
translation: 是的，是的，是他的剑！最后，我的任务几乎结束了！很好，年轻人，很好。现在，最后一步：培养有价值的人。我选择了你值得训练的古代格斗风格，那是肯塔罗大帝和他的一代又一代学生几个世纪以来对外界保密的！准备好了就跟我说，年轻人。

original: Yes, you look exactly like a person who can teach me something!
translation: 是的，你看起来很像一个能教我东西的人！

original: Yo <name_g>. Let's smoke some weed. Find me some, 30 leaves would be enough.
translation: 哟<name_g>。我们抽点大麻吧。给我找些，30片叶子就够了。

original: Yo man, thanks. I'll be chilling here, so ride near me, honk and speak to me while driving, or I'll ignore you!
translation: 伙计，谢谢。我在这里会很冷，所以骑到我附近，开车时按喇叭和我说话，否则我就不理你了！

original: Yo, <name_g>. Go talk to him. I'm a little tired, so…[*ZZZZZ*]
translation: 哟，<name_g>。去和他谈谈。我有点累，所以…[*zzzz*]

original: Yo, <name_g>. Let's get some more weed! Let's go check my drug dealer. He's at the motel, over there…
translation: 哟，<name_g>。我们再弄点大麻吧！我们去查查我的毒贩。他在汽车旅馆那边…

original: Yo, it's you, <name_g>! <name_g>, where's my car? I can't find it. Maybe you can help me find my car?
translation: 哟，是你，<name_g>！我的车呢？我找不到。也许你能帮我找到我的车？

original: Yo, man, that's really my car? Or is it not? I'm so stoned right now I couldn't really tell. Oh well, thank you anyway.
translation: 嘿，伙计，那真的是我的车？还是不是？我现在太迷糊了，真的说不出来。哦，不管怎样，还是谢谢你。

original: You are a disgrace to your family!
You are not ready yet.  Come back later.  [REQUIRES: MELEE 4, CUTTING 4]
translation: 你还没准备好。晚点再来。[需要：近战4，切割4]

original: You bet!  I'm not traveling anywhere without few bottles with different brewing liquids.  I can give you a few samples if you want some.
translation: 当然！我不会到处旅行，没有几瓶不同的酿造液。如果你要的话，我可以给你一些样品。

original: You can bring me anyone.  Children, elder, anyone that need protection!  We would remake this gym as base for needed.
translation: 你可以带任何人来。孩子，老人，任何需要保护的人！我们要把这个体育馆改建成我们需要的基地。

original: You do realize that you paid me with worthless green paper, right?
translation: 你知道你付给我的是毫无价值的绿皮书，对吧？

original: You have to kill me. That's the only way I can be freed from this curse, and not become one of that things after death. I know that I ask you too much, but…
translation: 你必须杀了我。只有这样我才能从诅咒中解脱出来，死后也不会变成那种东西。我知道我要求你太多了，但是…

original: You helped me resurrect my school, so here, take it.  It's one of the relics of our school, 'The Manual’.  You can take it now.  Good luck, student.  Don't get yourself killed!
translation: 你帮我重建了我的学校，所以来，拿去吧。这是我们学校的遗物之一，《手册》。你现在可以接受了。祝你好运，学生。别让你自己死！

original: You know what we do to liars?
translation: 你知道我们怎么对付骗子吗？

original: You know, I tried that moonshine. It tastes like HELL!
translation: 你知道，我试过那种私酒。尝起来像地狱！

original: You know, regular bartenders stuff: selling alcohol, serving snacks, watching for new faces, keeping eye on my girls.  To be honest, nothing really changed for me after <the_cataclysm>.  Except those nasty <zombies>, I <swear> hate them.  Always walking in large groups, trying to barge here and do havoc.  Last time they broke in here, all the tables were flipped and all curtains were striped!  Can you believe that, <name_g>?  <swear> madness, I tell you.
translation: 你知道，普通调酒师的工作:卖酒，提供小吃，寻找新面孔，照看我的女孩。老实说，在<大灾变>之后，我没有什么真正的改变。除了那些讨厌的<僵尸>，我<swear>讨厌他们。总是成群结队地走来走去，试图在这里闯出大祸。上次他们闯进来的时候，所有的桌子都翻了，所有的窗帘都有条纹！你能相信吗，<name_g>？<发誓>疯狂，我告诉你。

original: You need advice on how to get rid of nasty hobo?
translation: 你需要如何摆脱讨厌的流浪汉的建议吗？

original: You tried 'Uncle Ben's Mustang' moonshine. You feel like you died, resurrected and then died again.
translation: 你试过“本叔叔的野马”私酒。你觉得你死了，复活了，然后又死了。

original: You want to help me?  Thank you, I owe you a big one!  But if you serious about it, you don't have much time.  He gave no more than a month, so if you or me didn't make it in time…
translation: 你想帮我吗？谢谢，我欠你一个大人情！但如果你是认真的，你就没有多少时间了。他只给了一个月，所以如果你或我没有及时赶到…

original: You will die, right here, right now!
translation: 你会死的，就在这里，就在现在！

original: You will tell me the truth, right NOW, or <ill_kill_you>, <name_b>!
translation: 你现在就告诉我真相，否则<ill_kill_you>, <name_b>!

original: You'll cover my back, I'll cover yours.  That way, we have more chances to survive.
translation: 你掩护我，我掩护你。这样，我们就有更多的生存机会。

original: Your brother sent me. Let's get out of here, and fast.
translation: 你哥哥派我来的。我们快点离开这里。

original: [*He dies peacefully with a smile on his face. Something falls down from his pocket*]
translation: [*他面带微笑平静地死去。有东西从他的口袋里掉了下来

original: [COP] I'm a cop, so please, let me in peacefully.
translation: 我是警察，所以请让我安静地进去。

original: [FEMALE] Maybe if I do something for you, you would let me in…
translation: [女]也许如果我为你做点什么，你会让我进去…

original: [SPEECH] What would you lose if you let me in?
translation: 如果你让我进去你会失去什么？
